answers.answer: Well congrats. Lucky you dint have to go the full 40 weeks lol
My son is also measuring ahead he is estimated at 3lb2oz on ultrasound when I was at 27 weeks he's on the 91% tile. They don't think I'm making it to 36 weeks

Congrats! I'm also 31weeks today (just passed midnight here)and I had my ultrasound yesterday,and I also have Gestational Diabetes.I feel lucky because they told me she was just slightly (by very little) above normal size and they expect my girl to be able to stay until due date..I'm due Nov 15th.I think my girl will not come in October, would like to..but I think she is going to stay all the way :)

Our pregnancies are so similar. I have gest.Diabetes.  I am measuring a few weeks ahead since first ultrasound.but doc. kept lmp due date Nov.15th  instead of the ultrasound dated one. Ob says and confirms im further along than lmp due date. Due for my last ultrasound soon. He said she will be about 8-8 1/2lbs when born. I feel as thoughI will meet my baby anywhere from 24-31 of Oct..... I wany a healthy baby but I also don't want a 9 or 10 pounder bec. I am trying an all naturale vbac

I'm due Nov4th. At my 32 week 4D ultrasound my daughter waz measuring a little small :( 3lbs 11oz  doctor didn't seem concerned or change my due date, just said she won't be 8lbs when I deliver (thank god) never gave me a %tile though :/
I hope I do not go 40 weeks ladies lol I do not want to push a 10pnd baby out :)

question: I am 31 weeks today. Had ultrasound because I am always measuring 2 to 3 weeks ahead. Have been since 22 weeks. He is 4.7pnds, 17 inches long, and 79% tile. She is keeping my due date and just calling it large gestational baby and as long as I make it another 5 weeks, she is ok with me having the baby whenever he is ready to come out haha! I do not believe what so ever I will last till November 13th. Definitely going to be an October baby, I can feel it. Felt the same with my daughter and I was right and she was born at 37 weeks :)
title: update!! 31 weeks
